feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:31 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 9:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Fog. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
